sentences.en: A new cascade feedback control system with load feed forward of reheat steam temperature paper.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种新型具有负荷前馈—串级反馈的再热蒸汽温度控制系统.

sentences.en: Add the sieved plain flour, quickly mix well & reheat.
sentences.cn: 面粉过筛加入后中迅速 拌匀 后再加热.

sentences.en: At the higher temperatures, the efficiency is often boosted still further by using double reheat.
sentences.cn: 在较高的温度下, 效率往往是通过进一步利用二次再热得以增加.

sentences.en: For reheat temperature system, a novel internal model controller with decoupling is provided.
sentences.cn: 对一类有多变量、强耦合、大时滞特点的再热汽温系统, 提出一种新型内模解耦控制器.

sentences.en: I need to reheat the bath.
sentences.cn: 我需要把洗澡水再加热.

sentences.en: I reheated some soup for lunch.
sentences.cn: 我把汤重新热了一下，午饭时喝。

sentences.en: In this reheat mode, the air is first cooled ( and therefore dried ) before being heated.
sentences.cn: 在这种再加热模式下, 空气首先经过冷却 ( 因此成为干燥空气 ),然后再加热.

sentences.en: Let us reheat the cold boiled water.
sentences.cn: 让我们把凉白开水再热一下.

sentences.en: Please reheat the food from last night.
sentences.cn: 请把昨天晚上的饭再热一下.

sentences.en: Reheat the soup in the microwave.
sentences.cn: 把汤放到微波炉里重新加热一下。

sentences.en: Reheat the vegetables with remaining meat juice. Remove.
sentences.cn: 杂菜回镬,与煎猪扒时溢出的肉汁同煮, 盛起.

sentences.en: So it is important to extend optimal setting control technology for reheat furnaces of steel enterprises.
sentences.cn: 因此加热炉优化设定控制技术的推广对钢铁企业意义重大.

sentences.en: The applicability, reasonableness and safety of the oxygen scrubbing to reheat strip edge have been discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了用氧风洗技术提高带钢边部温度的可行性 、 合理性及安全性.

sentences.en: The reheat coil adjusts supply air temperature to offset building heat losses due to transmission.
sentences.cn: 再热盘管调节送风温度,以补偿因传热造成的建筑热损失.

sentences.en: The temperature of reheat steam directly influences the efficiency of a power station.
sentences.cn: 再热蒸汽温度直接影响电站的经济性.

sentences.en: Then reheat the solder cup of the fitting to draw up the alloy.
sentences.cn: 然后重新加热管件焊料杯口以吸入融合合金.

trans.tran_en: to make a meal or drink hot again
